thread.title: Prince serenades Madonna at Paisley Park party
thread.title_full: Prince serenades Madonna at Paisley Park party

title: Prince serenades Madonna at Paisley Park party
text:
Updated: 4:16 p.m. Friday, Oct. 9, 2015 | Posted: 4:16 p.m. Friday, Oct. 9, 2015 Prince serenades Madonna at Paisley Park party Related View Larger Pop superstar Madonna performs at the Xcel Energy Center in St. Paul, Minn. on Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. A few hours after the show, Madonna and a few lucky fans saw Prince perform a private concert at his Paisley Park studios in Chanhassen, Minn. (John Autey/Pioneer Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Pop superstar Madonna performs at the Xcel Energy Center in St. Paul, Minn. on Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (John Autey/Pioneer Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT Sponsored Links The Associated Press CHANHASSEN, Minn. â€” 
Some lucky music fans got to see two icons in the same room early Friday, as Prince performed for Madonna at Paisley Park. 
Minnesota Public Radio reports that about 30 Prince fans were summoned to Paisley Park late Thursday for something "extra special." 
The group was dancing to a mix of Prince and 1980s pop tunes when Madonna walked in, hours after performing in St. Paul as part of her Rebel Heart Tour. 
Her professional dancers and tour crew joined the dance party, and Madonna disappeared. 
She emerged later, followed by Prince. 
He took the stage and played a funky set, as Madonna sat on the edge of the stage at his feet. Minnesota Public Radio (http://bit.ly/1FWargx ) reports that Madonna looked up at him adoringly as he sang. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our Daily Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
